author: PTI
title: China to share coronavirus data with US: Trump
description: Mr. Trump spoke to Mr. Xi over telephone, days after the US president angered Beijing by referring to the coronavirus as “Chinese virus” and his Secretary of State Mike Pompeo said China’s ruling Communist Party posed a “substantial threat” to Americans’ heal…
content:
China will share its data related to the novel coronavirus pandemic with the US and the country will learn from Beijings experience, President Donald Trump has said, a day after he held an hour-long conversation with his Chinese counterpart Xi Jinping.
